summary: This document is an email chain from October 12, 2021, forwarding notification that a Witness Immunity request (ID 21000415) submitted on September 24, 2021, has been approved by the DOJ's OEO Special Approvals System. The email indicates that victim attorneys will be contacted about the approval.

events.title: Witness Immunity Request Submission
events.description: A Witness Immunity request with ID 21000415 was submitted to the DOJ's OEO Special Approvals System.

events.title: Witness Immunity Request Approved
events.description: The Witness Immunity request 21000415 was approved, as notified via email from the OEO Special Approvals System.

keyFacts: A Witness Immunity request (ID 21000415) was approved by the DOJ's Office of Enforcement Operations (OEO) Special Approvals System on October 12, 2021.
The request was originally submitted on September 24, 2021.
The email indicates that victim attorneys were to be contacted regarding the approval, suggesting the immunity relates to a victim or witness in a case.
The document reference EFTA00011094 is part of the Epstein-related document releases.
